ygData.subject: Emergency situation.
ygData.msgSnippet: Phobia attempts to open a com to the Predacon ship. Predacons This is Phobia, acting leader of this group, we have reconsidered your offer and wish to join

Phobia attempts to open a com to the Predacon ship. "Predacons This 
is Phobia, acting leader of this group, we have reconsidered your 
offer and wish to join you. I have two wounded bots who need 
immediate medical attention We're in route to your location as we 
speak. I await your response." He'd hoped that a plea for help to a 
dwindling army would have some perks, he'd given away thier reasoning 
but not thier advantage, he told them there were two injuries, he 
just didn't say who they were.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::KitKat::
> 
> Her body shook violently for a few moments.  She coughed up some 
more 
> mech fluid.  Her already badly beaten up body couldn't handle it 
any 
> more.  Her breathing slowed and almost stopped as she went into 
> stasis lock.
